Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.17.0
Messages: Fix Stop not working on Collector notification on Android 15.
Implement measurement collection throttling - you can now define how often measurements are saved.
Remove GPS battery optimizations - it caused issues on some devices and batteries improved a lot over time.
Add monochrome icon for more personalized experience.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.15.6
Messages: Enable upload of 5G (NR) cells to BeaconDB.
Show warning when uploading to custom BeaconDB url which is invalid.
Add option to select clustering level on the map.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.15.5
Messages: Fix battery optimization detection on Android 15.
Extend background location permission rationale to be more compliant with Google Play policy.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.15.4
Messages: Fix permission denied error when starting collector on Android 13.
